mese pamini deshapalana gamane di pakshaya wenuwen hire wilanguwe pawa watimata matasidu wiya.2000 wasarepawathi mathiwaranaye diewakatathibu aanduwa wisin mahanuwara disthrikkaye apapaksha katayuthu adapana kirimata ma siragatha kala athara ema mathiwaranaya meheyawimatamatasiduwuye bogambara sira gedara sita pakshaya wenuwen duk windimini.pasuwa ma nidahas wu athara ewakata pawathi aanduwen mahata sidu kala deshapalana hirihara saha asadharanayata erehiwawirodhaya pamin mage sankalpayak matha gamini athukorala upanayakathumage mulikathwayen eda mahanuwara sita kolambaa dakwa diyath kala ‘janabala meheyuma’ pa gamana pasuwa2001 wasaredi apa pakshaya balayata paminimata dadi dayakathwaya labadun pradhana deshapalana kriyakarakamabawata pathwiya.

abhyanthara guwan sewawa rata thula prachalitha kirimata nam, shri lankika sancharakayintada daragatha haki wana paridi guwan tikatpathwala mila adukala yuthu bawata karunu dakwu amathyawarayata abhyanthara guwan sewa wala niyuthu samajikayin pawasuye, meyata pradhana badhakaya wi aththe wadi wi athi wat badda bawayitha mema wat badda aniwaryayenma guwan magiyagen ayakaraganimata siduwana bawin, me pilibandawa sahanayak labadena lesa owun amathya nimal siripala da silwa mahathagen illimak kaleya.

ee sandaha rupiyal miliyana 1058.10 wayakara atha. 2009 wishesha wyapruthi sandaha anuradhapura disthrikkayata kilo mitar 41.39 k sandaha rupiyal miliyana 487.67 k labi thibe.2010 warshaye wishesha wyapruthi sandaha kilomitar 29.21 k wenuwen rupiyal miliyana 438.19 k wenkara atha. 2010 palath nishchitha pradhana yatathe kilomitar 22.54 k sanwardhanaya kirimata rupiyal miliyana 139.4 k wayakara thibe. 2010 rajarata nawodaya wadasatahanin, kilomitar 1.81 k sandaha rupiyal miliyana 8k da, 2009 – 2013 aasiyanu sanwardhana aramudal yatathe kilomitar 156.90 k ha palam 12 k sanwardhanaya kirima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 2402.95 wenkara atha. 2011 – 2012 anuradhapura nawa bas nawathumpala wada awasan kirimata salasum kara thibena athara, apekshitha piriwaya rupiyal miliyana 604 ki.disthrikkaye pradhana marga shreni 4kata beda thibe.
